summary: Despite different backgrounds and disapproving parents, a working-class teen falls in love with the wealthy son of a prominent family in a small West Texas town.
cast: Chad Allen|Polly Cole|Gretchen German|Marshall R. Teague|Tamara Clatterbuck|Jim Metzler|Ransford Doherty|Shonda Farr|Jason Ray Haney|Russell Sams|Kaitlyn Lewis|Cody Rogers|Kimberly Bigsby|Gary Driver|Jake Morgan|Robert Boyd|Austin Hayes|Tim Hoffman|Justin Mahon|Tanner Mahon|Charla Driver|Judy Melvin|Yasmine Abdul|Morgan Mercer|Randy Roark|Spencer Scott
keywords: love|f rated|teenage pregnancy|small town|rich boy poor girl
title: What Matters Most
